title: Fouling control of different pretreatments on ceramic fouling ultrafiltration: a review
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00440J, Critical Review
Yimu Qiao, Xue Han, Feiyong Chen, Cuizhen Sun, Linxu Xu, Jiaxin Yao, Yaqi Wu, Zhen Qi, Rupeng Liu, Xue Shen
Several pretreatment technologies for reducing ceramic ultrafiltration membrane fouling were reviewed, their advantages and disadvantages were analyzed, and the future development direction of the technology was discussed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
